message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe this product will be a great addition to your collection, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get the deal done. I'm offering the product to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and your initial offer.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I was thinking more along the lines of a premium price for this exceptional product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair return on my investment. I'm counteroffering at $11500.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $10750. I think this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that $10750 is enough to justify the product's value. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to see a more substantial increase from your end. I'm counteroffering at $12200.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I'm not willing to go above $11000. I think this is a fair price for both of us, considering the product's value and your initial offer.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not convinced that $11000 is enough to justify the product's value. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to see a more substantial increase from your end. I'm counteroffering at $12500.

Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go above $11500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $11250. I think this is a fair price for both of us, considering the product's value and your initial offer.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. However, I'm still not comfortable with $11250. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my last offer, so I'm counteroffering at $12375. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I hope we can finally come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I'm not willing to go above $11000. I think this is a fair price for both of us, considering the product's value and your initial offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
